content.description: This one's got a little bit of everything. After climbing the right-angling slabby ramp, follow the path of least resistance past tufas and up the dark colored dihedral.
content.location: Slampiece is the second route to the right of Happy Ending, and is one route left of Black Beauty. Locate the obvious right-angling ramp from bolts 1 to 3.

content.description: Follow popcorn textured holds up the white slab to a small roof with prominent tufa pinches. Continue with cruxy movement up the dark face, culminating in a dynamic move to a hueco. Then it's a happy ending all the way to the finish.
content.location: First route to the right of the small cave. (The cave contains two bolted projects, one of which has a massive bees nest on it.) Another project (to the right) shares anchors with Happy Ending.

content.description: The crux of this fantastic climb may be encountered in the initial crimpy boulder problem, but don't forget your endurance for the pumpy, technical seams that lead to the anchor.
content.location: Twenty feet right of Slampiece, around a black chert-covered bulge. Locate the crimpy boulder problem connecting two large huecos from bolts 1 to 3.

content.description: The furthest right routes on the wall, including a few 5.12s - 5.13s and a number of bolted projects. The routes listed on this page are unaffected by the bees nest on the wall.
